General.Name: Henan Qingshuiyuan Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Qingshuiyuan Technology CO.,Ltd engages in production, and sales of water treatment chemicals in China. The company also involved in the water treatment engineering, water environment management, soil remediation, and municipal engineering services. In addition, its portfolio includes organic phosphorus product, comprising HEDP, ATMP, DTPMP and PBTCA, etc.; and polymeric products, such as hydrolyzed polymaleic anhydride, polyacrylic acid, and polyacrylic acid copolymers. Its water treatment products are used in chemical, steel, electric power, sewage treatment, textiles, tap water, and other industrial applications. The company exports to approximately 50 countries. Henan Qingshuiyuan Technology CO.,Ltd was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jiyuan, China.
